alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 5:02PM EDT until July 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN PERRY COUNTY... At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Carefree Town, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Leopold, Ranger, Sassafras, Bristow, Celina, Magnet, Terry, Saint Croix and Apalona. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
